title: Lunar Wrait Caitlyn Legacy? Very Sad :(
body: I just found out that Lunar Wraith Caitlyn is a legacy skin and will be gone soon. I really want the skin and will have the money in a few weeks, but wow. I wish Riot would not do that with skins . . . I mean I know some skins they need to do that. It is very sad. :(

replies.body:
Well, they kinda announced it well ahead before it was released that it would be a legacy skin. If you want a good amount of time span for a heads up, surrenderat20.net is a great site for you to check out the latest skins on pbe. E.g. Heartseeker Orianna and Heartseeker Sona are most likely coming out near Valentine's. They're not legacy, but the when they announced the Lunar skins on surrender @20, they listed that those 2 skins would be legacy, but not the wukong one. 

Otherwise, Riot always gives a little heads up.

Yeah a friend told me they weren't. I randomly clicked on the art and story and saw that they were. Someone told me they put Legacy skins on sale in shop after four months . . . .. hopefully it will be there.
Usually legacy skins are taken out of the vault for bundles, and holidays, like the Harrowing and Snowdown.
I think I read somewhere they are doing it for the new skins sales thing they are doing.
The early sales (4-6 months), only applies to non-legacy skins.
Ah. I will have to wait till this time next year then? :(
Like most event skins (Lunar Revel, Snowdown, etc.)  you likely won't see them until next year.
I heard it is going to maybe be available in the hextech chests?
Yup, legacy skins are available in Hextech Crafting! I just mean in the store in general. ^-^
Radiant Wukong isn't Legacy, that is due to the fact that his last Legacy skin was Underworld Wukong
Yeah, I know lol. I'm just saying on surrender at 20, they listed that the morg and cait skins were legact, but wukong was not. So, yeah, I know it's not legacy.
Morg and Cait are Legacy, probably because they haven't received Legacy skins before Lunar Wraith

I don't think you're understanding what I said. I only said it'd be better if OP looked up pbe skins on surrender at 20, since they list if they're legacy or not (though subject to change). Learn to read please.
